item.title: Blog Posts
item.description:

The high-return activity of raising others’ aspirations by Tyler Cowen

The case for more energy by Matthew Yglesias

Cargo airships could be big by Eli Dourado

50 years of silence by Eli Dourado

North England vs. The Netherlands by Tom Forth

Writing, Briefly by Paul Graham

item.title: Books
item.description:
This is a list of books that I would recommend. My goodreads profile is here where I have more detailed ratings/reviews.

Economic Development

The Next Factory of the World by Irene Yuan Sun

How Asia Works by Joe Studwell

Economic Policy

Open Borders by Bryan Kaplan

Triumph of the City by Edward Glaeser

The New Geography of Jobs by Enrico Morreti

Narconomics by Tom Wainwright

1 Billion Americans by Matthew Ygelsias

item.title: Quotes and Tweets
item.description:
“Be the change you want to see in the world” - Mahatma Ghandi

“I am, somehow, less interested in the weight and convolutions of Einstein’s brain than in the near certainty that people of equal talent have lived and died in cotton fields and sweatshops.” - Stephen Jay Gould

“If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants” - Isaac Newton

“Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.” - Samuel Beckett
